DOC.criteria: Subjects considered by the Principal Investigator as an appropriate candidate for endoscopic sinus surgery, e.g., for the removal of the thickened and diseased mucosal tissue that blocks the ostiomeatal complex (OMC). Known or suspected hypersensitivity or intolerance to any macrolidelike compound, including erythromycin, clarithromycin, azithromycin or telithromycin.
